group_1.narration: "And so another record will be@inscribed in the book…"
"Now we can leave behind another story@of the Magical Girls of the past."
―Ui―@That's the sixth era we've recorded!@Slowly but surely, we've been adding more@books about Magical Girls to our collection.
―Iroha―@But if we keep going at this rate,@Touka and Nemu might be overwhelmed.
―Ui―@All we do is observe people from above.
―Ui―@Everyone's records get written in these books,
―Ui―@but it's still their job to get them all organized.
―Iroha―@We also have to compile the records of@the Magical Girls living in the present,
―Iroha―@so we should probably take a break from@going into the past for a little while.
―userName―@Mokyu, mokyu!

group_1.textLeft: I agree, let's travel back through the mirror.
*Gasp*
Wh-what...?

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Sis?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't know…but I can't keep@my eyes…open…
Iroha!

group_1.textRight: Mokyui! Mokyu, mokyu!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're right.
We have to hurry back to the Magia Record@and tell them what happened…!
Touka…! Nemu…!

group_1.textCenter: Oh no, Touka… What's going on…?

group_1.narration: This world is shrouded in miracles.
It all began when a girl made a contract@to become a Magical Girl after@making a wish to save her sister.
That desire for salvation blossomed and@transformed, and has now become@an Automatic Purification System that prevents@Magical Girls all over the world@from becoming Witches.
But in exchange for this miracle,@our hearts have been stricken with grief.
Saving so many people came at the cost of@Iroha's soul being eroded away,@and her disappearance from this world.
Along with her went Ui, her sister,@as well as userName, Touka, and Nemu,@who all worked together to save us.
To keep the five of them in our memory,@we sometimes visit the Rumor of the Eternal Sakura,@and somehow, it feels like we can sense@Iroha's magic there…
Yes, I was sure that the five of them@were still with us, up in that cherry blossom tree,@watching over us from above.
But then…

group_1.textRight: Ah…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Kagome. What a surprise@to see you here.
Have you come to see Iroha?

group_1.textRight: Yes… I heard some worrying rumors@that made me want to check…

group_1.textLeft: You mean the ones regarding the Automatic@Purification System malfunctioning?

group_1.textRight: Yes, those!
When Doppels emerge, purification@happens at an alarmingly slow rate…

group_1.textLeft: I heard the same thing actually,@which is why I came here.
But I can't sense Iroha's magic anymore…

group_1.textRight: Something really is wrong, then…!
Eek!

group_1.textLeft: Wh…what's going…?
Sakurako…!
Where have you been all this time?!

group_1.textRight: | Up above with Iroha and the others. |

group_1.textLeft: So you were with Ui, Touka, and Nemu, too…?

group_1.textRight: | Correct. |

group_1.textLeft: …Is everyone alright?

group_1.textRight: | Unfortunately, there's been an issue… |
| That's why I came here to ask for help. |

group_1.textLeft: I knew there was something wrong…!

group_1.textRight: | For the details, I will defer to the Nemu@inside this book. |

group_1.textCenter: Kagome and Yachiyo ― thank goodness you're here.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what…? How are you in that book…?

group_1.textRight: I'll spare you the reunion and@skip to what's urgent:
[textRed:Please save Iroha and the rest of us.]

group_1.textLeft: Hang on…! You need to start@from the beginning!
We know there's something wrong with@the Automatic Purification System,
but you can't just start giving us@mandates without explaining things.

group_1.textRight: The fact that I of all people skipped to the point@should evince the gravity of this situation,
but still, you have a point.
I'll give you a brief rundown.

group_1.narration: "First, to ensure we're all on the same page,@the five of us are components of the@Automatic Purification System that prevents@Magical Girls from becoming Witches."
"In parallel to that, we have also been@collecting records of Magical Girls."

"As our scope now extends to Magical Girls@in the past as well the present,@Iroha is the one now in charge of compiling these records,@rather than Touka or myself, since she has the power@to create mirrors to travel through time."
"Iroha's Soul Gem, however, is connected to@the Automatic Purification System and@cannot be moved, let alone duplicated."
"As a workaround, we created a tool called@a Soul Vessel that can transport the Soul Gem@through space, making travel between the past@and present possible."
"In short, we theorized that if we placed@Iroha's Soul Gem at the warp point and@carried a gate connected to it,@we could mask the distance between@her body and soul."
"But something unexpected occurred."
"Upon returning from her sixth trip,@Iroha immediately fell unconscious and collapsed."

"This is just me speculating, but I think@the workaround of keeping Iroha's soul in the present@while she operated in the past slowly destabilized@the concept of her existence,@and caused it to fragment."

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*
Is that why the Automatic Purification@System has become unstable?!

group_1.textRight: Correct ― and if Iroha disappears, the Automatic@Purification System will do so as well!
[textRed:So I need you all to help us by traveling]@[textRed:through time and retrieving Iroha's concept!]
There's no time for us@to sit around in shock…!

group_1.textLeft: Right…
I'll contact the members@of the Union right away.

group_1.textRight: And I'll send Aru around Kamihama,
while I reach out to the other groups…!

group_1.textLeft: For real…?
So basically it's like, the whole concept of Iroha's@existence is falling apart and she's in deep shit…

group_1.textRight: To think she and the Automatic Purification@System could both disappear…

group_1.textLeft: I understand that we need to gather up@the fragments of her concept,
but will everyone else in the Magia Record@be alright…?

group_1.textRight: Right. I'm concerned about your stability,@and Ui's condition as well.

group_1.textLeft: ｜The Rumor of the Eternal Sakura and@the Magia Record are in the same state.｜
｜So even though Iroha and the others@can't be seen, they're all still here.｜

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Holy crap! They're all right here?!

group_1.textLeft: It sounds like you're using the same@mechanism as the Soul Vessel…
…that was being used to carry Iroha's@Soul Gem through space.

group_1.textRight: You mean Iroha's domain and the Rumor of@the Eternal Sakura are one and the same?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's my understanding.

group_1.textCenter: You're exactly right. Everyone is able to exist here@via the same mechanism as the Soul Vessel.

group_1.narration: "Right where that Soul Vessel lies is@where Iroha sleeps.@Touka is lying right beside her."
"Perhaps Touka was affected because@her Rumor is bound to Iroha."
"My body, on the other hand, is still fine@because its Rumor is bound to Ui.@But due to the energy needed to be recovered@and the records we must maintain,@it's in a constant state of flux."
"Hence why I created a [textBlue:Rumor] to create@this alter-ego so I could speak with you."

group_1.textLeft: And what about Ui?

group_1.narration: "Ui is waiting on standby with Iroha's Soul Vessel.@Once people start traveling back in time,@she'll be managing the retrieval process."

group_1.textRight: So Ui's gathering magic will be@retrieving Iroha's concept…?

group_1.textLeft: Very astute.

group_1.narration: "The Soul Vessel Ui is holding onto is@connected to this empty one here.@When it senses the concept of our big sister,@it will automatically retrieve it."
"So I want each of you to take it and@trace through the six eras that@she went through."
"That way, as long as you don't cause a paradox@which causes history to reorganize,@you can simply follow the flow of time@and retrieve her concept without@actively searching for it."

group_1.textRight: …I understand the situation, purpose,@and method of this plan for now.

group_1.textLeft: Preparing for our trip in advance@was so smart!

group_1.textCenter: All we need now are people who are willing@to go through these mirrors.

group_1.narration: "I can only ask for forgiveness,@because what happened was my fault."
"I'm sorry I got everyone into this mess,@but…"
"Please help us save our big sister."

group_1.textRight: Of course. After all, every day we're being@saved by Iroha and the others.

group_1.textLeft: That's right, at times like this@we should be giving back.
Kyahaha★

group_1.textRight: Anyways, I think Juri and the others@will be arriving soon.
I'll head to the past as soon as I'm ready.
This is going to take a while to explain…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, by the way! Will we be able to@understand people's languages…?
I have so many problems with just@modern words…
I have a book for each of the six eras@I'll be sending you to.
Inside each is my alter-ego who will translate@the language and explain the historical period.
Incidentally, it works in a similar vein to Rumor of@the Wind Evangelist that possesses Kagome Satori,
in that it will give you the power to make@good first impressions on people.
I think this can help reduce situations where@other people are hostile towards you.

group_1.textRight: Just knowing that gives me some@peace of mind.

group_1.textCenter: Okay then! Everything's all set, so let's send@Mikazuki Villa back in time!

group_1.textLeft: Hang on.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Nemu.
What is it?

group_1.textRight: Is Iroha's body holding up okay?

group_1.textLeft: …We're already doing all we can.

group_1.textRight: While I can't see her, can I still@support her with my magic?

group_1.textLeft: It's only a conjecture, but it would be@foolish not to try.

group_1.textRight: …Well, then I'll stay here and@support Iroha with my magic.
…[wait:1.2][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:100501:motion_200][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]I guess I'll see ya later.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, are you sure? I was positive@you'd want to jump in headfirst.

group_1.textRight: You're really smart and Sana@is the best at hiding.
If I went, I'd probably just@get you into trouble!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, Felicia's starting to get more mature…
In that case, the two of us will do it!

group_1.textRight: Okay, then we're off..!

group_1.textCenter: Yes, I'll see you on the other side.

group_1.textRight: ｜Are you sure you want to stay behind?｜

group_1.textLeft: We still need people to act in the present.
I'll do what I can to help.
